content: lion brand pattern # lb20155 *cwe-grannysquareafghan pdf* skill level easy level 2 wool-ease® article #620 4 colors 11 balls total a 4 balls b 1 ball c 4 balls d 2 balls crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm gauge each small square 6½ inches x 6½ inches 16 5 cm each large square 13 inches x 13 inches 33 cm work 24 small squares 6 large squares sew together as shown in assembly diagram crochet border to finish
